name: nfnth

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wal(s0, wn(w0)), wnf(s0, w0))
-| wn(w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wal(s0, wn(w0)), wnf(s0, w0))
-| wn(w0)

comment: No variable is (effectively) free in a non-theorem. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Dec-2016.) ~ df-nf changed. (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 12-Sep-2021.)
